text: Arpi may refer to: ==Places== *Arpi, or Argyrippa, or Argos Hippium, an ancient city of Apulia, Italy *Arpi, Armenia, formerly Arpa, a town in the Vayots Dzor Province of Armenia *Lake Arpi, lake located in the Shirak Province of Armenia ==People== *Arpi Gabrielyan (born 1989), Armenian broadcaster, model, singer and actress *Claude Arpi, French-born author, journalist, historian and tibetologist *Ivar Arpi (born 1982), Swedish reporter, columnist and debater ==Others== *ARPI system, a system in the martial arts Arnis. See Arnis#ARPI ==See also== *Arbi (disambiguation)
title: Arpi (disambiguation)
